name: Local Barrage
description:
Local Barrage is a Local Multiplayer Shooter game where you join fast paced matches in which you shoot others players and try to win!

The game features multiple types of pickables: turrets with different firing modes, health and shields.

At the end of each round the last standing player gets points, when a player reaches the maximum required points, it wins!

You can play alone too, against dummy players.
